++ Organisation Architecture

The OA enables organisation of [Entity]s. It links together:
    * [EntityStore]s
    * MatchMaking
    * [Inventory]
    * [History]
    * StagerSystem

This is useful for:
    * [Personal]
    * [Games] (especially NetworkedGames)
    * [Business]
    * [Sharer]

++Architecture

The OA makes connections between entities through MatchMaking by utilizing the [Inventory]. The OA is a shell for data that correlates with eachother in a consistent and organized fashion. Examples include:
    * social networking
    * web applications
